answers.answer: You are leaving out some important information which is: If you have diabetes, how well controlled is your blood sugar? Trigger finger is a diabetic complication (google it, I don't know much about it), which comes from having uncontrolled blood sugars. Blurry eye sight is also symptomatic of high blood sugar. Do you test? Do you know how to control your blood sugar? If not, you should speak to your doctor and to a diabetic educator right away.
